prompts: Create a unique Psychic-type Pokemon that resembles an ancient artifact with vibrant colors.
I want a design for a winged Pokemon that has tribal patterns and a mystical aura.
Generate a creature that embodies the essence of both psychic energy and ancient symbols.
Make a colorful Pokemon inspired by Egyptian art, featuring wings and a mysterious personality.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon with an intricate design, combining bright yellows and blues.
Design an elegant bird-like Pokemon with striking colors and a mystical significance.
Give me a picture of a Psychic-type Pokemon that has a blend of modern and ancient styles.
